remarks: Any set of surreals is bounded below by a surreal with a birthday no greater than the successor of their maximum birthday.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Apr-2017.)
statement:
nobnddown $p |- ( ( A C_ No /\ A e. V ) -> E. x e. No ( A. y e. A x <s y /\ ( bday ` x ) C_ suc U. ( bday " A ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
